A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything that was set up in the Force Awakens was literally thrown away. This middle installment of this new trilogy is a spit in your face with an embarrassing mess of crude humor and poorly paced / written storyline. Nothing was accomplished in this movie \"saga wise\" other than the pointless SUICIDE of Luke Skywalker. I also no longer care about the new main characters. I have no interest in episode 9 now. \"Let the past die.\" More like\, let what we loved about Star Wars die.
